publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2377 Jackie Baillie: Asylum Seekers and Refugee Integration-That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive's commitment to work in partnership with the public, private and voluntary sector to welcome and integrate asylum seekers and refugees to Scotland and further welcomes the Executive's commitment to build improved dialogue with asylum seekers and refugees and host communities and, through partnership working, enable the provision of more accessible, co-ordinated and good quality services, protection from the threat of racist attacks and harassment, and the sharing of good practice to assist the integration of refugees. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*
